Name: Snake Flute
Description: Reposition the top OR bottom of a Snake anywhere in 5x5 area around the User.

Name: # in a bottle
Description:
Before this item is obtained, roll 1D6 and replace the "#" with the result.
Move # number of Spaces forwards.

Name: Shank
Description: Steal 5 Gold.

Name: Grenade
Description:
Throw a Grenade which Explodes in a 3x3 AoE at the Start of your Next Turn.
All Players who are inside the Explosion Lose 12 Gold.

Name: Teleportation Trash Can
Description: At the End of your Turn, Teleport to a Random Space.

Name: Uno Reverse Card
Description:
Choose a Player, their Current/Next Move Dice Roll is Negative.
If used on the User's Move Dice, must be applied BEFORE Moving.
NOTE: Player still gains regular amount of Gold.

Name: Discount Coupon
Description:
Roll your Dice and Gain double the amount of Temporary Gold.
NOTE: Caps at 50 Temporary Gold.

Name: Blunderbuss
Description:
Target is moved back by User's Dice Roll and Steals Gold based on the number.
NOTE: Negative number still Steals the normal amount of Gold.
NOTE: Steal Caps at 75.

Name: Feather
Description: Choose up to 2 Players (including the User) within a 5x5 to move up 1 Space.

Name: Coffee
Description:
Choose a Player to gain Advantage until the End of their Turn.
NOTE: Advantage applies on all their Dice Rolls.

Name: Spoiled Milk
Description:
Choose a Player to gain Disadvantage until the End of their Turn.
NOTE: Disadvatange applies on all their Dice Rolls.

Name: Cantrip of Guidance
Description:
Choose a Player, they can add +1d4 to Any Dice Roll this Turn.
NOTE: This is a Constant item, so cannot be directly exchanged for Move Points.

Name: Key of Possibilities
Description: Chest pool reward is increased by 3.

Name: Deck of Cards
Description:
Draw a Random card and move that many Spaces, do not gain Gold.
Drawing a Joker means you can pick any number between 1-13 and move that number of Spaces.

Name: Spooky Jumpscare
Description:
Move a Target 3 Spaces forwards.
They do not count as Passing any Spaces.

Name: Building Access Card
Description:
Access any Building in a 5x5 around the User, does not count towards Pass Trigger counter.
NOTE: Cannot access Chests or Gifts.
NOTE: Can only trigger Buildings with either a Start Turn or Pass Trigger.

Name: Clover Leaf
Description:
Gain 1 Reroll.
Rerolls are used to redo any Dice Roll or basically anything with a Loot pool, including: Chests, Exchange Vouchers, Shops, Gachapons and more.
NOTE: CANNOT Reroll pure Random outcomes.

Name: Over-Alarm Clock
Description:
Gain 25 Mana, this gained Mana bypasses the Mana bar's maximum limit.
Your next Artifact/Power Ability this Turn costs half Mana.

Name: Flashbang
Description:
Throw a Flashbang which Explodes in a 5x5 AoE at the Start of your Next Turn.
All Players inside the Explosion cannot use Rerolls or Constants this Turn, and have a 1D2 of Discarding the first item they use.
NOTE: The 1D2 only triggers on the very first item, does not apply afterwards even if the Player doesn't Discard the item.

Name: Nerf Gun
Description:
Choose a Player, they choose an item in their inventory to Downgrade with a Random item that is 1 Tier lower.
NOTE: T1 and T0 cannot be Downgraded.

Name: Red Card
Description:
Go backwards 3 Spaces on use.
If this item is Discarded or removed from your inventory in any way, you can choose to immediately end your Turn.

Name: Exchange Voucher
Description:
Exchange a chosen item for 1 of 3 choices of a random item of the same Tier.
NOTE: Exchanging a Curse will give you 3 Unique Curse choices.
NOTE: Cannot Exchange a T0 item.

Name: Radio Antenna
Description:
Choose 1 of 2 buffs to apply to the next item you use until the Start of your Turn:
Buff its Range to a minimum of 7x7 on User, Line of Sight can also be used as a 7x7.
OR
Increase its AoE from 1x1 -> all Adjacent -> 3x3 -> 5x5 -> 7x7. (effect stacks incrementally)
NOTE: Range and AoE buff does not apply to Line of Sight Projectile or Bound.

Name: Pipis
Description:
Gain 1 Constant.
A Constant is a number that can be added OR subtracted from Any Dice Roll.
Constants can apply to another Player's Dice Roll at any time, but has to be fast.

Name: Vanilla Extract
Description:
Before using the item, roll 1D4 to gain a buff:
1 = Gain 15 Mana
2 = Gain Advantage
3 = Gain 1 Reroll
4 = Gain a "1 Constant"

Name: Napalm Bath Bomb
Description:
Explodes in a 3x3 at the Start of the User's Next Turn over the span of 3 Turns.
All Players inside choose to either Lose 10 Gold or Discard 1 chosen item.

Name: Bolas
Description:
Target gains -2 Lingering Move Points for each item in their inventory.
If they already have Lingering Move Points, instead divide their next Move Dice Roll by 2 (rounded down).

Name: Snake Rifle
Description:
Create a Snake starting from you to the Target Space.
If you hit a Target, convert 8 of their Gold into Temporary Gold and they Forcefully Gain a "Snake Venom" Curse.

Name: Natural Bog Water
Description:
Roll your Move Dice again for Move Points, and Gain 10 Mana.
If you have a Curse, instead use the bottom effect:
Choose a Target Space within Line of Sight inf, all Players within a 3x3 AoE choose to either Lose 15 Mana or Discard 1 chosen item.

Name: Sticky Putty
Description: Choose a Player, they gain -2 Lingering Move Points whenever they use an item this Turn.

Name: Pressurized Pincushion
Description:
Throw a Pressurized Pincushion which explodes in a 5x5 AoE at the Start of your Next Turn.
All Players within the Explosion Gain -8 Lingering Move Points and Forcefully Gain the "Cursed Pin" Curse.
If a Player already had Lingering Move Points, they Forcefully Gain another "Cursed Pin" Curse.

Name: Javelin
Description:
Target Loses 5 Gold and Moves 3 Spaces in the direction of the projectile.
If the Target moves into a Wall/Ceiling, they Gain -6 Lingering Move Points once.

Name: Epic Sauce
Description:
For the next 3 Turns, apply this effect:
Whenever you use an item that targets another Player, they Lose 3 Gold and gain Disadvantage.
NOTE: Disadvantage stacks.
NOTE: This effect also applies to your items used on yourself.

Name: Gold Dust
Description:
Gain 30 Temporary Gold.
At the End of your Turn, Discard all your items in your Inventory.
NOTE: The Discard does not apply to Artifacts.

Name: Laggy Key
Description:
When opening a Chest, you can choose to roll 1D2 after gaining the item as many times as you want:
1 = Open the Chest again to gain another item.
2 = Lose all items obtained from the Chest, key effect ends.
NOTE: This synergizes with other Keys.

Name: Cutlass
Description:
The Target can choose the User to either:
Option 1. Steal 8 Gold and the User chooses 1 of your items to Steal.
Option 2. Steal 13 Gold and the Target Forcefully Gains a "Wound" Curse.
NOTE: The Target cannot pick Option 1 if they have 0 items.

Name: Dream 3000 Cartridge
Description:
Give a Target -8 Lingering Move Points.
If they now have -20 or more Lingering Move Points, remove all their Lingering Move Points and they Fall Asleep.

Name: Comically Large Boot
Description:
Drop down 1 Space.
If there is a Player beneath you, they Lose 5 Gold and Move Down 1 Space as well.
NOTE: Still considered Passing the Player.

Name: Enchanted Book
Description:
This item is an Item Modifier which can be applied to another item.
Once obtained in your inventory, roll 1D4 to turn this into a Random enchantment:
1 = Sharpness V
2 = Knockback II
3 = Protection IV
4 = Thorns II

Name: Escape Rope
Description: If you Start your Turn on a Hazard, you can choose to instead Move 1 Space in any direction (up down left right) and Start your Turn from there instead.

Name: Misprinted Membership Card
Description:
Before accessing the Shop, you can Roll 1D4 to change your Shop Tier:
1 = T1 Shop
2 = T2 Shop
3 = T3 Shop
4 = Choose Any Tier

Name: Safety Net
Description: All Players in a 3x3 gain both a "1 Constant" and 1 Reroll for 2 Turns.

Name: Key of Opportunities
Description:
When opening a Chest, you can choose an item aspect where the chest loot ONLY contains items which match that aspect.
Includes: Type, Theme, Version

Name: Misplaced Keys
Description:
When opening a Chest, you can choose to create a 3x3 AoE teleportation anywhere.
At the Start of your Next Turn, teleport all Players in the that 3x3 AoE to the 3x3 around the Chest.
NOTE: The Spaces you are teleported to shares the same AoE placement, so being on the corner of the teleportation AoE will place you on the corner of the Chest AoE.

Name: Misfortune Cards
Description:
Choose a Player (User or Target) and guess the final Result of next Move Dice (before rolling).
If you choose User, Gain 20 Gold if correct.
If you choose Target, they Lose 20 Gold if correct.
Choosing a Target also denies their free Move Dice Reroll.

Name: Dome Shield
Description:
Throw a Dome Shield which creates a 5x5 AoE around the Temporary Creation.
All item Ranges and AoE from all Players outside the Shield's AoE do not extend inside the Shield, and vice versa.
Lasts until the User's Next Start Turn.
NOTE: This negates Radar Helmet.

Name: Scissors
Description:
Create 2 3-width edge Portals in legal positions within a 5x5 around the User and mark 1 of its face for each with arrows, which lasts until the Start of the User's Next Turn.
Each portal connects 2 separate Spaces as if they're Adjacent, where moving through the Portal leads to the connected Space.
NOTE: If one portal side leads to a wall or some illegal placement, ignore it.

Name: Potion of Invisibility
Description: Choose a Player, they can now place Hazards/Buildings directly on top of Players during their Turn.

Name: Prison Cube
Description:
Throw a Prison Cube which triggers in a 5x5 AoE at the Start of your Next Turn.
Move all Players in the 5x5 AoE around it to the center of the 5x5.

Name: Monopoly Money
Description:
Gain 25 Temporary Gold.
Everytime you buy an item from the Shop, roll 1D4.
Rolling a 1 loses all the Temporary Gold obtained items from the Shop, prevents you from accessing the current Shop this Turn, and Gain 1 Stun Stack.

Name: Neutralizing Bandages
Description:
Discard all "Wound" Curses and Replace all other held Curses into Wounds.
Gain 5 Gold for each Non-Wound Curse converted.

Name: Spatial Grenade
Description:
Throw a Spatial Grenade which Explodes in a 3x3 AoE at the Start of your Next Turn.
Teleport all Players inside the Explosion into the Spatial Hallway and create a Spatial Anomaly in the middle of the 3x3 AoE.
NOTE: Targets will exit from the Spatial Hallway to the middle of the 3x3 Explosion.

Name: Diamond Dentures
Description: Eat a Building to Destroy it and Gain an "X Constant" or X Rerolls equal to the Tier of the Building.

Name: Dubious Warp Crystal
Description:
Teleport a Player to any Waypoint on the Board, telepoted Player has 1D4 of losing a Random Item.
NOTE: Premade Waypoints must be Unlocked for the User to teleport the Player there.

Name: Table Legs
Description:
Choose a Space and move all Space Modifications on it by Rolling your Move Dice (with a free Move Dice Reroll).
You can also use any Mobility, Reverse or Relocate items which directly apply to the User to move the Target Space.
If the Space Modifications cannot be applied in the new spot, ignore the relocated changes.
NOTE: Only applies to: Hazards, Buildings, Temporary Creations, Snakes/Ladders.
Blurb: It couldn't have just grown legs and walked away!

Name: Lottery Ticket
Description:
Choose a Number up to your Dice Maximum (d6 is from 1-6) and roll your Dice 3 times.
If all Dice Faces are the same by the End of the User's Turn, gain Gold equal to the Number chosen times 10.
NOTE: The 3 rolled dice are Quantity Rolls, so Constants don't cap out.

Name: Grapple Gun
Description:
Create a Ladder (both top and bottom) anywhere within a 5x5 on User.
NOTE: Can be placed directly on a Player.
NOTE: Gold is still Gained by going up the Ladder.
Range: 5x5 on User, both top and bottom

Name: Tesseract
Description:
Choose a Row/Column and Shift all [affected] on it by 1-5 Spaces along any direction chosen by the User.
NOTE: [affected] = Hazards, Buildings, Temporary Creations, Snakes/Ladders, Chests and Players

Name: Treasure Map
Description:
Roll 1D6, 6 = create a Chest anywhere within a 5x5 on User.
The Chest is automatically opened after this item is used.

Name: Morally Ethical Teleportation Device
Description: Swap Spaces with a Target.

Name: Hitbox Extender
Description:
Overwrite an Adjacent Space to the Target Space with a duplicate of the Target Space, CANNOT Target a completely Blank/Regular Space.
NOTE: Duplicated Space Modifications include: Hazards, Buildings, Chests, Temporary Creations.
NOTE: Does NOT duplicate Snakes/Ladders or Players.

Name: Ghost Costume
Description:
Until the End of your Turn, Steal 6 Gold and give Disadvantage whenever you Pass a Player.
NOTE: This Effect can be applied multiple times.

Name: Hot Potato
Description:
Timer starts at 0 and increases by 1 per Round.
This item Explodes/Discards itself the moment the timer hits 3, where all Players around a 5x5 on the User (including the User themselves) Loses 25 Gold and Discard 1 item.
NOTE: This item is Forcefully Given to the first Player you Pass.
NOTE: If you Pass 2 Players on the same Space, you can choose who gets it. (The chosen Player will still Pass the other at the Start of their Turn, giving it to them)

Name: Coffee Delivery Service
Description:
All Players Gain 3 "Coffee" Items.
Players who do not have enough inventory room can choose to Discard the Coffee in exchange for Losing 5 Gold and gaining Disadvantage per Coffee.

Name: X-Bomb
Description:
Throw an X-Bomb which Explodes in an X shaped pattern spanning all (diagonal) directions infinitely at the Start of your next Turn.
All Players inside the explosion Lose 18 Gold and must Discard 1 chosen item.

Name: Fisher Hook
Description: Pull a Target 1 Space towards the User.
Range: Line of Sight inf Bound, Target

Name: Fragility Essence
Description:
This turn, Destroy all [affected] after use, effect lasts until the Start of the User's Next Turn.
NOTE: [affected] = Hazards, Buildings, Snakes/Ladders

Name: Transmutator
Description: Change a Ladder into a Snake and vice versa.

Name: Dice Betting Game
Description:
Choose a Target and each Player Rolls their own Dice against each other.
The Player with the higher value Steals Gold from the Target based on the highest value, caps at 50.
NOTE: Constant can be used on each other, but Rerolls can only be used on the User.

Name: Energy Drink
Description:
Gain 2 Constant.
The next Constant you use can now Multiply this turn.

Name: Key of Multiplicity
Description: When opening a Chest, you can instead choose to Gain a duplicate of a Random item from anyone's Inventory.

Name: Junk Cannon
Description:
Choose any item in your inventory for the Target to Forcefully Gain.
The Target Loses Gold equal to the item's Cost+Tier.
NOTE: If an item with "Melancholic Recollection" is regained, do not apply the effect.

Name: Potion of Jump Boost
Description: Choose a Player, their Move Points go vertically upwards instead of along the Board this turn.

Name: Handheld Stop Sign
Description:
Until your Turn, all Targets cannot Pass you and instead immmediately stop in their tracks.
NOTE: This does not apply to the Players you are directly on top of.

Name: Forged Receipt
Description:
Refund an item for Gold based on its Cost.
NOTE: Can be used while Gaining an item.

Name: Glass of Limeassist
Description:
Gain 2 Constant.
The next Constant you use can now Divide this turn.

Name: Prickly Pear
Description: Gain 5 Constant and -5 Lingering Move Points.

Name: Stubborn Clam
Description:
While held, you can roll your main dice to attempt to open this once per turn.
If it's a 15 or higher, turn this item into a Pearl.

Name: Antique Coin
Description:
While held, you can Roll 1D2 as many times as you want:
1 = Discard this item.
2 = Gain 5 Gold.

Name: Babbling Brook
Description:
Item Modifier, All Players in a 5x5 on User (including User) convert 10 Gold into Temporary Gold, and Forcefully Gain the "Snake Venom" Curse.
This Item can only be used when combined with another item, which can be done at any time.
NOTE: Only 1 Item Modifier per item maximum.

Name: Golden Glaze
Description:
Item Modifier, When used, gain 2 Gold whenever you use another item this Turn.
This Item can only be used when combined with another item, which can be done at any time.
NOTE: Only 1 Item Modifier per item maximum.

Name: Draining Device
Description: Steal 15 Mana from All Players within a 5x5 AoE on User.

Name: Hardy Coconut
Description: Gain 5 Constant and 1 Stun Stack.

Name: Poisonous Dart
Description:
Give a Target -5 Lingering Move Points.
If they now have -6 or more Lingering Move Points, they also Gain a "Mushroom Spores" Curse.

Name: Cursed Key
Description: When opening a Chest, you can choose to replace its loot pool with Curses instead.

Name: Rigged EMP
Description:
Lose 10 Mana.
Do not Gain Mana from your next Move Dice Roll.

Name: Bananarang
Description:
Throw within Line of Sight inf and triggers at the Start of User's next Turn.
The first Player within Line of Sight (including the User) Loses 5 Gold, gets Stunned and creates a Banana Peel on them, priority starts backwards.
If this does not intersect with a Target, apply this effect to the furthest backwards Space within Line of Sight.
NOTE: If a Banana Peel cannot be placed, do not place it.

Name: Swarm of Mosquitos
Description: Lose 4 Gold and gain -1 Lingering Move Points, effect does not expire until you leave the Space OR you have 0 Gold.

Name: Gas Mine
Description:
Initial: Place the "Gas Cloud" Environment in a 3x3 around the Hazard with a Duration of 3 Rounds.
———— Gas Cloud effect ————
Waiting: Lose 6 Gold, doesn't apply to other Players before the User in the turn order.
Overtime: At the Start of every Round, all Players inside Lose 8 Gold and Gain -3 Lingering Move Points.

Name: Anti Water
Description:
Your next Move Dice is negative.
NOTE: User still gains regular amount of Gold.

Name: Banana Peel
Description:
Roll 1D2 to get Stunned.
1 = denying the next Move Dice.

Name: Bear Trap
Description:
Gain -4 Lingering Move Points, must move 4 times to escape.
NOTE: Subtracts from Move Points, but the User gains 1 free Move Point if they will Move 0 Spaces.

Name: Landmine
Description:
Explodes in a 3x3 at the Start of the User's Next Turn.
All Players within the explosion Lose 10 Gold and Stun.

Name: Border Control
Description: Lose 10 Gold.

Name: Web Slinger
Description:
Create a Spider Web on the Target Space.
Pull the User to the Space Adjacent to the Target Space in the direction of Line of Sight.

Name: Spider Web
Description: Divides your Move Dice by 2, rounded down.

Name: Low Poly Textures
Description:
Downgrade a Random item in your inventory to a Random item that is 1 Tier lower.
NOTE: T1 and T0 cannot be Downgraded.

Name: Snake Pit
Description: If Move Dice is 3 or less: Lose 8 Gold and gain the "Snake Venom" Curse.

Name: Naval Mine
Description:
Explodes in 5x5 at the Start of the User's Next Turn.
All Players within the explosion Lose 25 Gold and Stun.

Name: Limitless Butter Pump
Description: Forcefully Gain a "Liquid Popcorn" Curse.

Name: Donation Bin
Description: Choose 1 item to Discard.

Name: Arrow
Description:
Move 1 Space in the direction of the Arrow.
This Hazard can be rotated in any direction when placed, stays in that orientation permanently.
NOTE: Up to 5 Arrows can be connected together to transport the User, inf loops or anything above 5 Arrows does not trigger.
NOTE: If this Hazard has its effect applied in some way without placing it (Hunting Trophy, Spiky Helmet), the User can choose any direction.

Name: Difficult Terrain
Description:
Gain Disadvantage for All Dice Rolls until the End of your Turn
NOTE: Disadvantage is roll 2 times and use the lowest value.

Name: Lingering Potion of Weakness
Description: Forcefully Gain a "Weakness Status" Curse.

Name: Whirlpool
Description:
You must Roll 5 or more on your Move Dice to escape or Gain -6 Lingering Move Points.
This effect lasts until the Next Turn if the Target is still on the Hazard.

Name: Banana Blaster V1000
Description: Create 4 Banana Peels Adjacent to Target/Space hit.
Range: Line of Sight inf Projectile, Target

Name: Caltrops Pouch
Description:
Place up to 3 "Caltrops" Hazards within Range.
NOTE: Caltrops can be placed directly on a Player.
——— Caltrops Hazard ———
Gain -2 Lingering Move Points.
If you now have -5 or more Lingering Move Points, Gain a "Wound" Curse.

Name: Spatial Anomaly
Description:
Teleports you to the Spatial Hallway.
NOTE: See separate mechanics on how it works.

Name: Sweeping Guillotine
Description:
At the Start of your Next Turn, sweep all Players within a horizontal 5 Space wide AoE centered on this Hazard.
All Players inside choose to either Lose 18 Gold or Forcefully Gain 3 "Wound" Curses.

Name: Funny Fungi Patch
Description: Forcefully Gain 2 "Mushroom Spores" Curses.

Name: Steam Vent
Description:
Move 3 Spaces in the direction of the Arrow.
This Hazard can be rotated in any direction when placed, stays in that orientation permanently.
If you Move into a wall/ceiling, get Stunned.
If you happen to Move directly onto another Steam Vent (without colliding into a wall), continuously repeat the Steam Vent's effect until you are not on one.
NOTE: The Arrow Hazard effect applies last.
NOTE: If you return back onto a Steam Vent you already Passed, end this effect.

Name: Petrification Rune
Description: Replace 2 of your items with Rocks.

Name: Killbox
Description: Teleport back to either the Start Space, any unlocked premade Waypoint, or any normal Waypoint (chosen by the Target).

Name: Reversal Totem
Description: Place 5 Reverse Tiles in a + pattern.

Name: Uh Oh! Banana Bazooka V3000
Description:
Fires in the chosen direction at the Start of your Next Turn.
All Players Lose 25 Gold, get Stunned, and creates Banana Peels in a 3x3 around the Target Space.
Range: Line of Sight inf Projectile, Target

Name: Go to Jail
Description:
You physically cannot leave this Space Number until you Escape.
At the Start of every Turn, you can either roll Doubles with d6 or pay 50 Gold to Escape.
Fee halves at the End of your Turn. (25 > 12 > 6 > 3 > 1)
Escaping allows you to continue your Turn to Roll the Move Dice like normal.
NOTE: Reroll and Constants only apply to one of the Dice.
NOTE: The Jail State vanishes if the Hazard is Destroyed.

Name: Missing Textures
Description: Forcefully Gain a "Corrupted Data" item.

Name: Field of Pollen
Description: For every Space you move, Roll 1D4 where 1 = Stun.

Name: Minor Prank
Description:
Explodes in a 7x7 at the Start of the User's Next Turn.
All Players within the explosion Lose 35 Gold, Stun and Discard 2 items.

Name: Chain and Dagger
Description:
Steal 8 Gold from a Target in Line of Sight.
Create a Bear Trap on the Target Space (on the Target) and 2 more towards the User.
Range: Line of Sight inf Bound, Projectile

Name: Speed Bump
Description: If you Roll above a 5 on your Move Dice, get Stunned instead.

Name: Barbed Wire
Description:
Forcefully Gain a "Wound" Curse for every 5 Move Points from your Move Dice.
NOTE: Rounded down, so 4 Move Points is gain nothing.

Name: Temporal Anomaly
Description: At the Start of your Next Turn, Teleport back to where you triggered the Hazard.

Name: Loyalty Card
Description:
While held, track the number of items you've bought at the Shop. (0/5)
The 5th item you buy costs 50% less and resets the counter.
NOTE: Overwrites the original 33% Shop Discount.

Name: Snake Eyes
Description:
While held, anytime your final dice result is a 1, you can choose to reroll 1 time again.
If you Roll a 1 again from the Reroll, lose 11 Gold and immediately use the original 1 result.

Name: Pyrite Coin
Description:
Whenever the User directly loses Gold, regain Temporary Gold equal to the amount Lost.
NOTE: Applies to Steal and Lose, not spending, trading or storing Gold.

Name: Steam Engine
Description: While held, if you hold 2 or more Passives (including this item), Gain 3 Gold at the Start of every Turn.

Name: Golden Idol
Description: While held, if you reach the End, Gain 20 Gold and Discard this item.

Name: Bingo Card
Description:
While held, if you have 3 Unique items with the exact same Theme, you can exchange all the items for Gold at 7 times their Tier.
NOTE: Does NOT include this item.
NOTE: The Theme must be exactly the same, so Mobility is not the same as Mobility/Hinder.

Name: Talisman
Description:
While held, choose 1 held Curse to nullify its "While held" effect.
This will continue to nullify it until the Curse is gone from your inventory.

Name: Buried Compass
Description:
Generate 5 Random Numbers:
If you Start your Turn on any of the Spaces, treat it as if it's a Chest and generate a new Random Number.
NOTE: If a Chest is on the Random Number, treat as 2 Chests.

Name: Darkwood Shank
Description: Once per Turn, if you Pass the same Target 3 times, choose any item they have and Steal it from them.

Name: Space Bag
Description: While held, Hazards and Buildings can be placed on any Space (except on Players) in the Spatial Hallway.

Name: Ammonite
Description:
While held, Rocks have 1D4 chance of giving a Fossil when Destroyed (given on a 4).
NOTE: Only applies if you directly Destroy the Rock.

Name: Hot Wheels
Description:
After using 3 items in the same turn, each item used afterwards gives 1 Gold in increasing increments of 1 to a maximum of 5 AND certain bonus effects.
1st item: 1 Gold, 1x1 on User, 1D2 Stun all Targets
2nd item: 2 Gold
3rd item: 3 Gold, 3x3 on User, 1D2 Stun all Targets
4th item: 4 Gold
5th item: 5 Gold, 5x5 on User, Stun all Targets
NOTE: After using 5 more items to a total of 8 items, this effect ends to total Gain of 15 Gold.

Name: Cassette Tape
Description:
While held, before Rerolling, save the first possibility you started with.
You can choose whether to use the first possibility or new Rerolled possibility.

Name: The Old One Two
Description: If you use a Constant, Gain a "2 Constant", only activates Once per Turn.

Name: Bargaining Chip
Description:
While held, you can Refund any item to the Shop at half price.
NOTE: 0 Cost items like Curses cannot be Refunded.

Name: Wild Energy
Description:
Turns into the next item you obtain, whether from the Shop, Chest, etc.
NOTE: If multiple items are obtained at once, choose any of the obtained item.

Name: Brothless Bones
Description:
While held, Gain 5 Gold whenever you gain a Stun Stack.
NOTE: Can apply multiple times.

Name: Catalyst Converter
Description:
While held, you can substitute a Mana Cost with Gold at 1/2 the rate to a minimum of 10 Gold.
NOTE: Specifically does not apply to Tiny Town Lvl2 Ability.

Name: Stone Tablet
Description: Every third (0/3) Quest you complete, gain a free Tier 1 Quest Reward.

Name: Treehouse Schematics
Description: Whenever you use a Snake/Ladder, gain a Random Building.

Name: Tourist's Memory Book
Description:
Record the next 6 Unique Buildings you've Triggered:
After recording 6 Buildings, you can Trigger any of the 6 Building abilities (with the Fee) at any time.
Once you use a recorded Building's ability, it can no longer be used again.

Name: Skull of Gold
Description: While held, Temporary Gold does not expire.

Name: Tome of Dark Arcana
Description:
Record every unique Curse that you've obtained while this is held:
By sacrificing an item with a Cost of 10 or more, you can Accurse an Item with any chosen Curse that you've recorded, adding a new effect alongside the original item's effect.
When an Accursed item is used, the targeted Player additionally Gains the chosen Curse. (not Forcefully Gained)
NOTE: Effects may vary but cannot be applied on n/a Range items.
Blurb: This book is so un-peak that every flower in a 5 mile radius died when I tried to read it.

Name: Gold Magnet
Description: At the Start of your Turn, Steal 4 Gold from all Players within a 5x5 AoE on you.

Name: House in a Globe
Description:
Choose a Building in your inventory and Attune it to this item.
When this item is used, trigger the Building's effect. Can only be used Once per Turn.
Afterwards, Roll 1D6 where 1 = Discard this item.
NOTE: Non-Euclidean Doorframe lasts until the Start of the User's next Turn.
NOTE: Attuning to a Rock or anything similar allows you to place it when this is used.
NOTE: Cannot Attune to any Gold Themed Buildings.
NOTE: Fees are still paid.

Name: Police Siren
Description:
When another Player Steals from you, trigger this effect on your Next Turn, ends at the End of your Next Turn.
If you End your Turn Adjacent to or on the same Target, reclaim the Stolen goods and Target loses 15 Gold.
If the stolen item is gone from the Target's inventory, instead Steal 20 Gold.

Name: Paralytic Poison
Description:
While held, whenever you Steal from a Target, give them -5 Lingering Move Points.
If they have Lingering Move Points already, roll 1D2 for Stun instead.

Name: Crystalline Locket
Description:
While held, before opening a Chest, you can view the items you would've gotten and choose whether to open the Chest or not (even with keys).
Whenever you use a Key item, gain 4 Gold per Key.
NOTE: You can only view 1 possibility and cannot use different key combinations for different possibilities.

Name: Trade-in Coupon
Description:
While held, the next time another Player Steals from you, you can instead choose any item in your Inventory to give to them.
NOTE: One-use item.

Name: Coin of Silent Friendships
Description:
All Steal effects are multiplied by 1.5.
NOTE: Stacks Multiplicably.
NOTE: Bypasses the Steal Cap.

Name: Meal Ticket
Description:
While in a Shop, you can buy 1 item from "The Diner" for 12 Gold.
Can only be used once per turn.

Name: Jewel
Description:
While held, Rolling the highest Face of the Dice gives you Gold equal to the Dice Maximum (D6 gives 6 Gold).
NOTE: Only active while there is 1 highest Dice Face.

Name: Trap Scavenging Kit
Description:
While held, Roll 1D2 whenever you place a Hazard:
2 = Retain the Hazard.

Name: Crown of Briars
Description: Gaining Lingering Move Points gives you Gold equal to half the amount rounded down.

Name: Dumbbell
Description:
While held, a Constant can be converted into a 5 Constant.
Can only be used Once per turn.

Name: Fortunate Pendants
Description: While held, your free Move Dice Reroll can now be used as a normal Reroll (if you don't use it on Move Dice).
Blurb: Do you have Lucky Charms? "Nah but we got Fortunate Pendants, everyone eats those."

Name: Exo Armor Plating
Description: While held, all incoming 1D2 Stun effects are replaced with a 1D4 where 1 is Stun.

Name: Ring of Mana Regen
Description: Whenever your Move Dice rolls an Odd number, gain double the Mana.

Name: Mimic Tooth
Description:
While held, roll 1D2 when opening a Chest:
1 = Lose 15 Gold and Forcefully Gain a "Wound" Curse.
2 = Pick 2 out of 6 items instead from the Chest Reward.

Name: Salt Cube
Description:
Whenever another Player triggers a Hazard, Steal 7 Gold.
If you Trigger a Hazard, Lose 7 Gold.

Name: Vine Lasso
Description:
Whenever you use a Snake/Ladder, modify the next item's effect for this Turn:
Snake: The next Player you directly Target Loses 5 Gold, Gains 10 Temporary Gold and Forcefully Gains the "Snake Venom" Curse.
Ladder: The next Player you directly Target Moves 6 Spaces Forwards or Backwards.

Name: Clover
Description:
(New Ability) Lvl 1: Give a Player Advantage/Disadvantage for 1 Turn. (15 Mana)
(New Ability) Lvl 2: Gain 1 free Reroll this Turn. (25 Mana)
(New Ability) Lvl 3: Give a Player Weighed or Impossibility modification until End of Player's Turn. (25 Mana)
NOTE: CANNOT Reroll pure Random outcomes.
Blurb: You forgot about Dice Modification (Weighted) and (Impossibility) didn't you?

Name: Zipline
Description:
The Zipline creates Zipline Ladders instead of normal Ladders, which all get deleted before the ability is used again.
————— All Abilities —————
(New Ability) Lvl 1: Create a Zipline Ladder within a 5x5 on User. (25 Mana)
(New Ability) Lvl 2: Immediately go up or down a Ladder that you are currently on. (35 Mana)
(Passive) Lvl 3: Whenever you use a normal Ladder, regain Mana equal the Gold obtained times 5.
NOTE: Zipline Ladders can be created on top of Players.
NOTE: Zipline Ladders do NOT give Gold to the User's next Turn.
Blurb: Bitten by a radioactive splinter, this Artifact allows you to TRAVERSE the Board and SCALE buildings with an infinite supply of Ladders.

Name: Wings
Description:
(New Ability) Lvl 1: Go up 1 Space. (20 Mana)
(Combo 1) Lvl 2: Along with the first ability, choose another Target within a 3x3 on User to also go up 1 Space. (0 Mana)
(Combo 1) Lvl 3: Choose any Player within Line of Sight inf to go up 1 Space. (0 Mana)
Blurb: An Artifact for the guy who replies to "What's up?" with "The Sky" and gets away with it.

Name: Pocket Dice
Description:
(New Ability) Lvl 1: Switch the result of your own Dice Roll with a pre-saved Dice Result. (25 Mana) (Currently Saved: 6)
(New Ability) Lvl 2: When rolling your Move Dice, roll an additional time and pick between any result to use. (15 Mana)
(Passive) Lvl 3: You can now own an infinite number of Dice and choose which Dice to use before rolling any Dice Result.
NOTE: You start with a 6 saved at the beginning of the game.
Blurb: Unfortunately, there are no Dice Jails included with this Artifact to place your bad dice in.

Name: Credit Card
Description:
(New Ability) Lvl 1: Set your Shop Tier to any Tier between 1-3 this turn. (25 Cost)
(New Ability) Lvl 2: In the Shop, obtain the cheapest item for free, same priced items is randomly selected. (40 Mana)
(Passive) Lvl 3: Whenever you buy an item, gain Mana equal to double its Tier.
NOTE: You still require the actual Shop Tier to buy Dice.
NOTE: Lvl 2 Ability does not trigger the Lvl 3 Passive.
Blurb: This card beats a Royal Flush.

Name: Satellite Dish
Description:
(New Ability) Lvl 1: Buffs the next item Range to a minimum of 5x5, Line of Sight is overwrited also be used as 5x5. (25 Mana)
(Combo 1) Lvl 2: Ability now affects either Item Range, AoE or both. (5 Mana)
(Combo 1 or 2) Lvl 3: Item Range buff is increased to 7x7, and Line of Sight to inf. (5 Mana)
NOTE: Range and AoE increase does not apply to Line of Sight Projectile or Bound.
NOTE: AoE increases by 1x1 -> all Adjacent -> 3x3 -> 5x5 -> 7x7. (effect stacks incrementally)
Blurb: For those who want to [TARGET BOUND - STRIKE IMMINENT] a party popper next to someone's ears.

Name: Backpack
Description:
The Backpack's Attune is used as if you had the item in your inventory and used it directly from there.
————— All Abilities —————
Lvl 1: Attune/use a T1 Item. (25 Mana)
Lvl 2: Attune/use a T2 Item. (30 Mana)
Lvl 3: Attune/use Any Item. (20 + 5 * itemTier Mana)
NOTE: You cannot Attune Mana or Gold/Temporary Gold items.
Blurb: Sometimes if you put an item in here, it'll get duplicated and you can use it again and again.

Name: Tiny Town
Description:
(New Ability) Lvl 1: Use 1 Building in your inventory (while paying its Fee). (20 Mana)
(New Ability) Lvl 2: Gain Gold equal to each Tier of every Building in your inventory. (30 Mana)
(Passive) Lvl 3: All Players in a 3x3 on User have to pay a 5 Gold whenever they access a Building.
NOTE: You cannot use Mana or Gold Buildings.
Blurb: To be a governor of a town within your own pockets — a Tiny Town.

Name: Hunting Trophy
Description:
Anytime another Player triggers a Hazard, you can use your Abilities to apply the Attuned Hazard's effect onto the Player.
————— All Abilities —————
New Ability: Place any Attuned Hazard in a 3x3 on User. (20 Mana)
Lvl 1: Attune a T1 Hazard. (20 Mana)
Lvl 2: Attune a T2 Hazard. (25 Mana)
Lvl 3: Attune a T1 OR T2 Hazard. (20 or 25 Mana)
NOTE: Duplicate Hazards do not apply twice to the Target.
Blurb: Rumors say that those who have a successful hunt wear a Spiky Helmet.

Name: Steel Toe Boots
Description:
(New Ability) Lvl 1: Go down 1 Space. (15 Mana)
(Combo 1) Lvl 2: Apply 1D2 Stun if you dropped and landed directly on top of another Player. (10 Mana)
(Combo 2) Lvl 3: Dropkick the Player you landed directly on 3 Spaces down. (25 Mana)

Name: Spiky Helmet
Description:
Anytime a Target Starts their Turn on top of you (1x1 Range), you can activate your Ability to apply a Hazard in your inventory onto them.
Every time you level up, increase the Range from 1x1 > 3x3 > 5x5.
————— All Abilities —————
Lvl 1: Apply a held Hazard to the Target. (15 Mana)
(Combo 1) Lvl 2: Apply a second held Hazard to the Target. (15 Mana)
(Combo 2) Lvl 3: Apply a third Hazard to the Target. (15 Mana)
NOTE: Duplicate Hazards do not apply twice to the Target.

Name: Training Weights
Description:
(New Ability) Lvl 1: Skip your Turn to Gain a 5 Constant for next Turn. (15 Mana)
(Passive) Lvl 2: If you spend Constants on Move Dice, any Player you Pass Loses 5 Gold and gets -5 Lingering Move Points.
(Passive) Lvl 3: The "5 Constant" gained from the Lvl1 Ability now lasts forever until used, and can be stacked.

Name: Voodoo Doll
Description:
(New Ability) Lvl 1: Give -3 L-Points to a Target in Line of Sight. (10 Mana)
(Combo 1) Lvl 2: Give the same Target -5 L-Point OR a "Cursed Pin" Curse. (20 Mana)
(New Ability) Lvl 3: If the Target has a "Cursed Pin" Curse, Move them 1 Space in any direction. (10 Mana)
NOTE: Lingering Move Points shortened to "L-Point" for this description.

Name: Calculator
Description:
Currently Saved Constants:
————— All Abilities —————
(New Ability) Lvl 1: Store a Constant to be used later OR use the stored Constant and remove it, up to 4 UNIQUE Constants can be stored. (25 Mana)
(Passive) Lvl 2: Whenever you apply a Constant onto a Dice Result (other than Move Dice), gain Gold equal to 3 times the Constant's value.
(New Ability) Lvl 3: Your next Constant can now Multiply or Divide. (50 Mana)
NOTE: Multiply caps at the maximum for Quality Rolls, unbounded for Quantity Rerolls.
NOTE: Divide is rounded, and 0 on Move Dice is always set to 1.

Name: Quilt
Description:
You now own an isolated 3x3 Pocket Dimension with Spaces 1-9, where Hazards/Buildings can be placed on it.
————— All Abilities —————
(One-Use) Lvl 1: Create a 3x3 teleportation AoE on User which teleports all Players and Temporary Creations inside to the Pocket Dimension. (25 Mana)
The Space you are teleported to shares the same position as the AoE, so being on the corner of the AoE correlates to the corner of the Pocket Dimension.
(Upgrade) Lvl 2: Increase size of the Pocket Dimension and the Lvl 1 ability to a 5x5 AoE.
NOTE: The Pocket Dimension is an isolated space like the Spatial Hallway.
NOTE: The Pocket Dimension AoE buff expands AROUND the original size, so the original 3x3 size is in the middle of the new 5x5 size.
NOTE: Moving off the last Pocket Dimension Space leads to where you originally were on the Main Board.
NOTE: If this Artifact is Destroyed, all Players inside the Pocket Dimension return to where they started from.

Name: Sleeping Cap
Description:
L-Points do nothing and cannot be removed by Moving.
Stun Stacks are automatically converted into -8 Lingering Move Points.
If you Start your Turn with -15 L-Points or more, roll 1D2 at the Start of Every Turn, where 1 = immediately Ends your Current Turn to Fall Asleep for Next Turn.
Falling Asleep automatically Skips your entire Turn and removes -15 L-Points.
While asleep, you cannot use any Reroll or Constant items and any Player who Passes you while you are Asleep can choose to Steal one of your items OR Steal 15 Gold.
————— All Abilities —————
(New Ability) Lvl 1: Move 1 Space forwards and gain -3 L-Points. (5 Mana)
(New Ability) Lvl 2: Gain -8 L-Points. If you have -15 L-Points or more, roll 1D2 to Fall Asleep at the End of your Turn. (12 Mana)
(New Ability) Lvl 3: Use -15 or more L-Points to make another Player within a 5x5 Fall Asleep. (30 Mana)
NOTE: Lingering Move Points shortened to "L-Point" for this description.

Name: Mosquito Needle
Description:
If you End your Turn on a Player, Steal 5 Gold from them. (5 Mana)
This increases by 5 Gold for every successful streak of being on a Player up to a maximum of 15 Gold.
The multiplier resets after breaking the streak.

Name: Sewing Kit
Description:
If the Target has -8 L-Points or more, Steal Gold equal to the number of L-Points they have and Remove all their L-Points. (15 Mana)
NOTE: Lingering Move Points shortened to "L-Point" for this description.

Name: Mop
Description:
Choose a Hazard or Temporary Creation and Destroy it. (15 * Item Tier Mana)
Mana Cost is 10 times the Tier of the thing Destroyed.
NOTE: T1 cost 15 Mana, T2 cost 30 Mana, T3 cost 45 Mana

Name: Bell on a Stick
Description:
Strike a Target or Building, either Stunning the Target or Destroying the Building. (15 Mana)
Every time you strike, all other Targets in a 5x5 around the Target Space Roll 1D4 for Stun.

Name: Wand of Blast Wave
Description:
Shoot a shockwave blast on a Target Space within Line of Sight and apply the below effect: (25 Mana)
Players on the Target Space have 1D2 Stun.
Players on Adjacent to the Target Space Move 3 Spaces in the direction of Adjacent Space and get Stunned if they Move into a wall/ceiling.
NOTE: Can be used as many times as you want but still costs Charges.

Name: Stun Stick
Description:
Roll 1D2 where 1 = apply 1 Stun Stack to the Target. (15 Mana)
If they already have a Stun Stack, instead give them -3 Lingering Move Points.

Name: Atomizer
Description:
Choose a direction and fire a laser in that direction at Start of your Next Turn.
Destroy all Hazards and Buildings in the path of the laser, and All Players hit Lose 25 Gold. (25 Mana)
NOTE: The laser cannot be shot through a portal to hit a Player multiple times.

Name: Biogas Combustion Furnace
Description:
You can sacrifice Any 2 items to Gain 1 free Reroll permanently until used. (35 Mana)
Overload: Lose 20 Gold.

Name: Rocket Fists
Description:
If you are directly ahead or behind a Target according to the Board, you can instead spend your remaining Move Points to Move them forwards/backwards. (20 Mana)
Overload: Before using the Ability, Stun all Targets in a 3x3.

Name: Super Sprinters
Description:
Roll your Move Dice again (with the free Move Dice Reroll) to gain that many Move Points, but gain 1 Stun Stack afterwards.
Overload: Gain 2 "Wound" Curses.
NOTE: The extra Move Dice does not give Gold or Mana.

Name: Self Destruct Button
Description:
Stun all Players in a 5x5 (including the User). (25 Mana)
Overload: Lose 10 Gold and all your Mana.

Name: Energy Core
Description:
All Artifact Abilities and Powers cost half as much Mana this Turn. (25 Mana)
Overload: Lose 3 Gold for every Ability use.

Name: Warp Drive
Description:
Gain 3 Constant. (25 Mana)
Overload: Roll 1D4:
1 = Gain 3 Stun Stacks.
2 = Lose 5 Gold.
3 = Discard a chosen item.
4 = Nothing happens.

Name: Radar Helmet
Description:
Your next item's Range is inf. (30 Mana)
Overload: Lose 7 Gold for every item left in your inventory before this item is Discarded.

Name: 5G Brain Broadcaster
Description:
Choose a Target and force them to use one of their items DURING the User's Turn. (30 Mana)
The Target still gets to choose what to do with the chosen item.
NOTE: Delayed timer items still apply at the Start of the Target's Turn.
NOTE: Only applies to Items, Hazards, Buildings and Curses.

Name: Holographic Rock Projector
Description: Create a Rock within Line of Sight inf. (15 Mana)

Name: Trap on a Keychain
Description:
Attune 3 T1 Hazards.
Whenever a Target triggers a Hazard, choose one of your Attuned Hazards to additionally apply to them. (15 Mana)
NOTE: Duplicate Hazards do not apply twice to the Target.

Name: Mounted Raygun (Active Piece)
Description:
All Players within Range Lose 1 Mana which increases by 1 Mana for each Space away from the Player, up to a maximum of 6 Mana at 6 Spaces away. (30 Mana)
All Players hit also do NOT Gain Mana from their next Move Dice Roll.
Overload: Lose Mana equal to the Target who Lost the most amount of Mana, also do not Gain Mana from your next Move Dice Roll.
NOTE: The Lose Mana effect stacks if it hits the same player multiple times through a Portal.

Name: Bandolier
Description:
Attune any 6 Unique Items and record them here:
Once the 6 items have been Attuned, you can roll 1D6 to use one of them at random. (20 Mana)
Can only be used Once per Turn.
NOTE: You CANNOT Attune an Item with the EXACT same Theme combination. (Mobility is not the same as Mobility/Hinder)

Name: Key Ring
Description:
All Attuned Keys:
Can be Attuned to any Key item.
When opening a Chest, you can choose an Attuned Key to use. (15 Mana)

Name: Kitchen Apparatus
Description: Roll your Dice to Gain a Random item from "The Diner", with a base -2 to the final value. (22 Mana)

Name: Weakness Status
Description:
While held, gain -2 Lingering Move Points at the Start of every Turn.
Use: Gain -10 Lingering Move Points and Lose 3 Gold whenever you Move until the End of your Turn.

Name: Liquid Popcorn
Description:
While held, first item Rolls a 1D2 where 1 = Discard the item instead.
Use: Discard 3 chosen items, you can also spend 15 Mana per item to instead choose another Target within a 3x3 on User to Discard a chosen item.
NOTE: This item can only be used if all 3 item Discards are applied.

Name: Junk Food
Description:
While held, whenever your Move Dice Rolls a 5 or less, replace the result with a 1.
Use: Replace any Dice Result with a 1D2.

Name: Cursed Pin
Description:
While held, gain -5 Lingering Move Points whenever you change to a different row.
Use: Move 1 Space in any direction up to 3 times, Forcefully Gaining a "Wound" Curse for each movement.
NOTE: Must Move at least 1 time, cannot move 0 Spaces.
NOTE: Snake/Ladder and teleporting counts as changing to a different row.

Name: Corrupted Data
Description:
While held, roll 1D4 where 1 = downgrade a chosen item.
Use: Downgrade 3 chosen items, can pick the same item multiple times but must do at least 3 times.
NOTE: T1 cannot be Downgraded.

Name: Snake Venom
Description:
While held, at the Start of Turn increase this counter by 1 (0/3).
The moment this counter reaches 3, Convert 7 Gold into 10 Temporary Gold. Reset the counter to 0 afterwards.
Use: Convert 15 Gold to 30 Temporary Gold, Lose 2 Gold whenever you purchase an item.

Name: Hot Sauce
Description:
While held, Start your Turn 1 Space ahead.
Use: Instead, Start your Next Turn 3 Spaces ahead instead.
If there is a Player ahead when you go 3 Spaces ahead, Forcefully Give the Curse to them.

Name: Trick
Description:
While held, Lose 5 Gold whenever you use a Building. (including Premade Buildings)
Use: Lose 10 Gold and this Turn, Forcefully Gain a "Treat" and 5 Gold whenever you use a Building.
NOTE: Pass Trigger maximum still applies to used Buildings.

Name: Wound
Description:
Does nothing and cannot be removed at all.
Every turn, roll 1D6 to Discard this Curse.
NOTE: The roll is separate for each instance of the "Wound" Curse.

Name: Mushroom Spores
Description:
While held, whenever you Trigger a Hazard, Replace a chosen item with a random Curse.
Use: For every Hazard you trigger next Turn, all Targets in a 5x5 on User AoE Forcefully Gains a "Wound" Curse.

Name: Eldritch Mop
Description: Destroy all Hazards and Buildings in a 3x3 AoE.

Name: Expert Yoink Gloves
Description: Steal any item from the Target.

Name: Splash Potion of Weakness
Description: All Players in a 3x3 AoE roll 1D2 for Stun and Forcefully Gain a "Weakness Status" Curse.

Name: Jolly Gift Airdrop
Description:
Create 6 "Gift" Buildings in random Spaces.
NOTE: A Gift is Pass Trigger, Gain 1 random item based on Chest prob.

Name: Fingertip of Midas
Description: Destroy all Buildings and Hazards Adjacent to the User and regain Gold equal to its Cost.

Name: Pocket Watch
Description:
Gain 3 Rerolls.
At the End of your Turn, Lose 5 Gold for each unused Reroll.

Name: Bottomless Pockets
Description: Steal all Buildings and Hazards on a Space.

Name: Gale Infused Fan
Description: Move all Targets or Temporary Creations in a 5x3 (long side) Adjacent to the User in the chosen fan direction by 5 Spaces.

Name: Anchor
Description: Immediately End your Turn on use, ignoring remaining Move Points.

Name: Scroll of Teleportation
Description: Teleport to a Space in a 5x5 around the User.

Name: Cone of Cold
Description:
All Targets in a Line of Sight 3 Cone gain -4 Lingering Move Points.
Lingering Move Points for the Target now consume 2 Move Points until the End of the User's Turn.
NOTE: Lingering Move Points do not go into decimals and instead stay at 1.

Name: Knight's Soul
Description:
Move in a legal L-Shape position.
NOTE: This physically moves the User 4 Spaces in an L-Shape rather than teleporting, so it's affected by Rocks, Portals and other things.

Name: Ticket to Brazil
Description:
Send a Player to the Spatial Hallway.
The Player leaves from the Spatial Hallway to the Space they were on originally.

Name: Unicorn Helmet
Description: All Spaces within a 3x3 on User are considered Hazards based on all Hazards in the User's inventory, lasts until User's Next Turn.

Name: Photocopier
Description:
Choose a Target and overwrite your inventory with all their items.
NOTE: Does not apply to:
Photocopier
Blurb: Hey, just wondering if you got your photos printed?

Name: Lockbox
Description:
Gain a Chest Reward, synergizes with Key Items.
NOTE: The Chest is treated as if it was on the same Space as the User.

Name: Stink Bomb
Description:
All Players in a 3x3 range have double Disadvantage on all their Dice Rolls.
Lasts until the Start of their Next Turn.

Name: Otherworldly Keys
Description: When opening a Chest, you can additionally teleport all other Targets in a 5x5 around the Chest to the Spatial Hallway.

Name: Scroll of Earth Wall
Description:
Create 3 Rocks perpendicular to Line of Sight.
Does not create a Rock directly on the Target.
NOTE: If Range is changed by Radio Antenna/Satellite Dish, you can pick any orientation to place the 1x3 Rocks.

Name: Golden Bullet
Description: Give a Target 10 Gold, Target loses 20 Gold at the End of their Turn.

Name: Horse-Sized Lance
Description:
Steal Gold from Target for each Space traveled/Passed, up to 100.
NOTE: Snakes and Ladders use distance formula.
NOTE: The number of Spaces traveled resets if this item is used again.

Name: Bioluminescent Nuclear Parasite
Description:
Explodes on the User's Next Turn, where Players Lose Gold based in increasing increments of 10 from the edge towards the center/thrown item.
Whenever a duplicate of this Item is obtained, it is automatically merged together to increase the blast radius by 1. Capping out at 7 total merges with 15x15 AoE and Lose 70 max.
NOTE: Duplicating this item is only obtained at Lvl1.
NOTE: When 2 copies of this item combine, use the highest level and add +1 to it.
NOTE: Does not extend into the Spatial Hallway.

Name: Shaman's Book
Description:
Choose a Row and fill it with Gas Clouds, all Players on the same Row Forcefully Gain the "Snake Venom" Curse.
———— Gas Cloud effect ————
Waiting: Lose 6 Gold, doesn't apply to other Players before the User in the turn order.
Overtime: At the Start of every Round, all Players inside Lose 8 Gold and Gain -3 Lingering Move Points.

Name: Jungle Wood Warhorn
Description:
Apply all the following effects to all Players in a 5x5 around the User (including the User) for 3 Turns:
Gain Advantage on All Rolls.
Gain 1 Snake Flute usage for free once per turn.
Can choose to climb Snakes like a Ladder if Starting their Turn on them.

Name: Clementine
Description: Gain 4 Constant on use and Gain 4 "Clementine Slices".

Name: Garlic Butter
Description:
Item Modifier, Gain 20 Mana on use, Artifact ability can be used 1 more time this Turn.
This Item can only be used when combined with another item, which can be done at any time.
NOTE: Only 1 Item Modifier per item maximum.

Name: What's inside? Sponsored Crate
Description: Gain 4 Random Unique T1 items.

Name: The Bulk Gloves
Description:
Choose an Adjacent Space, the Target Space and the Spaces Adjacent to it in a 1x3 and upheave all Hazards, Buildings, Temporary Creations, Players and Chests on the Target Space 5 Spaces forwards.
If the Target Space intersects with a Target, destroy all Hazards, Building and Chests on the Target Space to Stun the Target, each Space Modification applies a various effect:
Lose 10 Gold per Building.
Lose 5 Gold per Hazard.
Lose a Random Item per Chest.

Name: Causality Hourglass
Description:
Stored results:
Anytime you Roll your Dice, record a copy of each UNIQUE the Dice Result into this item.
You can use this item to replace any Dice result with any recorded number.
Upon reaching 10 unique Dice Results, immediately Discard this item and Lose 20 Gold.

Name: Dancer Shoes
Description:
Move 3 Spaces in any Adjacent direction 2 times separately.
NOTE: Moving into a wall/ceiling cuts off the remaining distance.

Name: Gravity Grenade
Description:
Choose a direction (up, down, left, right) and throw a Gravity Grenade which Explodes 3x3 at the Start of your next Turn.
All Players inside the Explosion Move in the chosen direction until they hit a wall/ceiling/floor, gaining Lingering Move Points equal to the number of Spaces Passed while Moving.
NOTE: If where the Player will go intersects the Space they're already on (via Portal), they do not Move.

Name: Relic Fragment
Description: This can be used to substitute for any Ability's (Artifact and Power) Mana cost.

Name: Bandit Key
Description: Forcefully Gain the first 3 items from a Chest.

Name: Bad Luck Grenade
Description:
Attune to a Curse.
Throw this Grenade within Line of Sight inf, Explodes in a 3x3 at the Start of the User's Turn.
All Players inside the Explosion Forcefully Gain the Attuned Curse and Lose 12 Gold.
NOTE: Players do not gain a Curse if there was no Curse Attuned.

Name: Trumpet of Change
Description:
Rearrange up to 5 Building, Hazard, Player, Temporary Creation, Snake/Ladder, or Chests to a different Space within a 5x5 on User.
NOTE: You can rearrange a Hazard on top of a Player.

Name: Inverse Grenade
Description:
Throw an Inverse Grenade which Explodes 3x3 at the Start of your Next Turn.
All Players who are NOT inside the Explosion Lose 12 Gold.
NOTE: The Explosion AoE of this Grenade extends into isolated Boards like the Spatial Hallway.

Name: Mirror Cube
Description:
Throw a Mirror Cube within Line of Sight inf which triggers at the Start of the User's Next Turn.
When triggered, create Portals on the Edge of the 5x5 area which last until the Start of your Next Turn, where each inwards Portal leads to the opposite inwards edge and vice versa.
NOTE: Illegal Portals are not spawned, such as 1 Portal side being missing or 1 side leading to a wall.
NOTE: Crossing the outwards Portal will also lead you to the opposite outwards Portal.

Name: Golden Handcuffs
Description:
Give the Target 10 of your Gold.
In exchange, Target gains -3 Lingering Dice Points and cannot use any items this Turn.
NOTE: This does not work if you do not have enough Gold.

Name: Household Keys
Description:
When opening a Chest, you can instead choose to teleport onto any Space at the Start of your Turn.
You cannot claim the End Space Reward this Turn.
NOTE: Chest occurs first, Snakes/Ladders second, then tp onto any Space afterwards.

Name: Default Cube
Description:
Throw a Default Cube within Line of Sight inf as a Temporary Creation.
All Spaces in a 5x5 around the Target Space are considered Regular Spaces, replacing every Space modification except for Players.
Effect is removed at the Start of the User's Next Turn or if the Default Cube is destroyed.
NOTE: Does not replace Start or End Space.
NOTE: All Round/timed based Space modifications (both new and pre-existing) are treated as if it was just placed when the effect ends.
NOTE: Overlapped Spaces still follow the original Space's Space Modification rules.

Name: Gift Card
Description: Gain 25 Temporary Gold.

Name: Spicy Wings for Two
Description:
Choose up to 2 unique Players in a 5x5, one Player Gains 7 Constant while the other Forcefully Gains the "Hot Sauce" Curse.
NOTE: If you Choose 1 Player, you can choose either result.

Name: Santa's Goodie Bag
Description:
Choose a Player to either:
Option 1. Target Forcefully Gains 2 "Rock" Buildings.
Option 2. User picks an item in their inventory for the Target to Gain.

Name: Replicating Virus
Description:
Choose any item with a 8 or less Cost.
All Players within a 5x5 on User Forcefully Gains a copy of the item.
NOTE: Only applies to Items, Hazards, Buildings, Passives, Powers, and Curses.

Name: Melancholic Recollections
Description:
Item Modifier, whenever this item is lost (Discarded, Stolen, used), roll 1D2 where 2 = Forcefully Gain the item back.
NOTE: This Item Modifier can be applied onto any item Type.
NOTE: If this item is getting Stolen but Rolls a 2, the Target does not successfully Steal the item.
NOTE: If this item is Exchanged using the Exchange Voucher, it will undo the Exchange if a 2 is Rolled.
NOTE: Discarding this item while in a Shop or Chest also counts and rolling a 2 will Forcefully Gain it back.

Name: Nope Card
Description:
If a Target uses an item, you can choose to deny the item before its effect takes place.
The Target cannot use the denied item until the Start of their Next Turn.
This item can be used at anytime.
NOTE: During Dice Intermission/Standoff, the item deny applies during their Current OR Next Turn.

Name: Divine Spear Gungnir
Description:
Choose a Space anywhere on the Board and launch your spear to skewer any Player in that Space at the Start of your Next Turn.
All Players in the Space get Stunned, and Lose 15 Gold and Gain -5 Lingering Move Points for each item they have.

Name: Mana Potion
Description:
Gain 75 Mana.
NOTE: Still caps out at your Mana Bar maximum.

Name: Handcannon
Description:
Shoot a cannonball which explodes in a 3x3 AoE.
All Players inside the 3x3 AoE Lose 10 Gold.
Destroy all Buildings, Hazards, Snakes/Ladders inside the Explosion.
Immediately Activate/Explode all Grenade-like Temporary Creations inside the Explosion.

Name: Dungeon Core Panic Button
Description:
Activate ALL Hazards on the current Board to Trigger at the Start of the User's Next Turn.
Players within the Hazard's AoE Trigger the Hazard's effect.
NOTE: This does not apply to Spiky Helmet.
NOTE: Regular Hazards only apply on the 1 Space that it's on.

Name: Black Hole Bomb
Description:
Initial: Throw a Black Hole Bomb which Explodes at the Start of the User's Next Turn.
Initial: Upon Exploding, create an Environment in a 3x3 AoE, suck in all Players within a 3x3 to the center of the AoE, affected Players Roll 1D2 for Stun.
———— Black Hole effect ————
Waiting: Same thing, suck in Players in 3x3 to center and they roll 1D2 Stun.
Overtime: First, increase the AoE from 3x3 (start here) > 3x3 (again)> 5x5 > 7x7.
Overtime: Second, all Temporary Creations, Buildings and Hazards within the Environment are Destroyed.
Overtime: Third, all Players inside are sucked to the center, Roll 1D2 Stun, and Lose Gold equal to the total Cost of everything Destroyed.
Duration: Lasts for 3 Rounds starting from the Aftereffect and disappears upon Starting the Round with a 7x7 AoE (will not go to 9x9).

Name: Earthquake Rod
Description:
Choose a Building and Destroy it.
All Players within the AoE Lose 7 + each Building's Tier amount of Gold and Roll a 1D2 for Stun per Building Destroyed.
NOTE: Does not apply to Premade Buildings.

Name: Obsidian Greatsword
Description: Transfer all your Lingering Move Points to All Targets within the Line of Sight 3.

Name: Gunpowder Pepper Shaker
Description:
Item Modifier, When used, create a 5x5 Explosion on you.
All Players (including you) inside the AoE Lose 10 Gold and Discard 1 chosen item.

Name: Growth Ray
Description:
Choose a Player and enlarge their hitbox to a 3x3 around them, effect Ends at the Start of the User's Turn.
The enlarged hitbox is counted as if the Player is on the same Space as the hitbox.
NOTE: If the Player's hitbox is in a Rock, Destroy it and add its hp as Lingering Move Points to the Player.
NOTE: The Player can trigger Duplicate Traps and can use Buildings multiple times within the Enlarged Hitbox.
NOTE: Negative Explosion affects like Grenades only apply to the Player once, despite hitting multiple hitboxes.

Name: Laundromat
Description: Pass Trigger, Gain 10 Temporary Gold

Name: Toybox
Description: Pass Trigger, choose 1 of 2 random Tier 1 items to Forcefully Gain.

Name: Rock
Description:
Must move 3 times total towards to break, blocks Line of Sight.
Progress towards breaking the Rock is reset at the End of the Player's Turn.
NOTE: If a Player is somehow on the same Space as the Rock, destroy it and add all of its remaining hp to the Player as Lingering Move Points.

Name: Mortar
Description: Pass Trigger, Create a Grenade on any Space.

Name: Campfire
Description:
Pass Trigger, End your Turn.
If you Started your Turn on this Building, you cannot Roll your Move Dice AND trigger this Building.

Name: Gyre of Gold
Description:
Pass Trigger, roll 1D6 with a x3 Gold multiplier, lose if odd and gain if even.
1 = -3 Gold
2 = 6 Gold
3 = -9 Gold
4 = 12 Gold
5 = -15 Gold
6 = 18 Gold

Name: Gold Mine
Description:
Generates 3 Gold at the end of every Round.
When Passed, collect all the Gold and reset the Gold counter

Name: Lucky Shrine
Description:
Pass Trigger, all Dice Rolls have Advantage until the End of your Turn.
The next Next Move Dice you roll has Advantage.

Name: Scrapyard Shredder
Description: Pass Trigger, Choose an item in your inventory to Discard and gain Temporary Gold equal to its cost.

Name: Essential Oil Diffuser
Description:
If you Start your Turn within a 3x3 on this, Lose 3 Gold and Roll 1D2 before rolling your Move Dice.
1 = Your Move Dice now makes you go backwards.

Name: Storeroom
Description:
Pass Trigger, Gain a Chest Reward.
NOTE: Key items can be used on this.

Name: Potato Peeling Cell
Description: Start Turn (Fee: Skip your Turn), Gain 5 Gold.

Name: 15th Century Cannon
Description:
Pass Trigger, Choose an Adjacent direction and fire a cannonball in that direction at the Start of the User's Next Turn.
The first Player within the path of fire Loses 40 Gold which decreases by 5 Gold or each Space away from the Cannon (Lose 5 Gold at 8 Spaces away).

Name: Sugar Rush Cake
Description: Pass Trigger, gain a "Super Sweet Slice".

Name: Lightning Rod
Description:
Pass Trigger, at the Start of your Next Turn, zap all Targets in a 5x5 around you.
All Targets hit gain Disadvantage, Lose 15 Mana, and do not Gain Mana from their next Dice Roll.
If you hit no Targets, you Lose 10 Mana and gain Disadvantage instead.

Name: Directional Sign Post
Description: Pass Trigger, you can choose to walk up, down or continue.

Name: Shop Tent
Description: Pass Trigger, access the Shop.

Name: Waypoint
Description: Start Turn, Teleport to Any Waypoint

Name: Boulder
Description:
Takes up 2x2 Spaces, must move towards 6 times in order to break,
Progress towards breaking the Boulder is reset at the End of the Player's Turn.
NOTE: If a Player is somehow on the same Space as the Rock, destroy it and add all of its remaining hp to the Player as Lingering Move Points.

Name: The Diner
Description:
Pass Trigger, Roll your own Dice for 5 Gold to Gain a random item, can be done as many times as you want.
1 = Junk Food
2 = Vegetables
3 = Water
4 = Steak
5 = Sardines
6 = Clementine
7 = Hot Potato
8 = Frozen Yogurt
9 = Deflated Raspberry
10 = Tea
11 = Rock Candy
12 = Sand and Land Burger
13 = Brimming Glass of Spiders
14 = Sugar Rush Cake
15 = Spicy Wings for Two
16 = Shrimp Fried Rice
17 = Exploding Fruitcake
18 = Potion of Healing
19 = BBQ Sauce
20 = Everything Bagel
NOTE: Negative Faces use absolute value, Decimal Faces can choose to add 1 more to its own result.

Name: Cellular Tower
Description:
Pass Trigger, Choose any buff (or both) to apply to the next item you use until the Start of your Turn:
Buff its Range to a minimum of 9x9, Line of Sight can also be used as a 9x9.
AND/OR
Increase its AoE from 1x1 -> all Adjacent -> 3x3 -> 5x5 -> 7x7. (effect stacks incrementally)
NOTE: Range and AoE increase does not apply to Line of Sight Projectile or Bound.

Name: Pawn Shop
Description:
Pass Trigger, you can sell any item for 5 Gold per Tier.
NOTE: Curses cannot be sold.

Name: Hotel
Description: If you Start your Turn on this, the User who placed this Steals 20 Gold from you.

Name: Quarry
Description:
Pass Trigger, roll 1D2:
1 = Gain 5 Rocks
2 = Gain a Fossil

Name: Punching Machine
Description: Pass Trigger (Fee: 5 Gold), if you Roll higher than a 10, gain 20 Gold

Name: Shady Alleyway
Description:
Start Turn (Fee: Any 2 items), all Steal effects are x1.5 until the Start of the User's Next Turn.
NOTE: Stacks Multiplicably.
NOTE: The x1.5 applies to the final result, so it bypasses the Steal Maximum Cap.

Name: Banana Rotato
Description:
Pass Trigger (Fee 5 Gold), roll 1D20.
1-5: Gain a Banana Peel
6-10: Gain a Bananarang
11-15: Gain Banana Blaster V1000
16-19: Gain "Uh Oh!" Banana Bazooka V3000
20: Gain 30 Gold

Name: 3D Printer
Description:
Pass Trigger (Fee 15 Gold): Gain a copy of any item in your Inventory.
Can duplicate items with applied Item Modifiers at 5 Gold per Modifier.

Name: Gachapon Machine
Description: Pass Trigger, choose 1 of 2 random Tier 2 items to Forcefully Gain.

Name: Seer
Description: Pass Trigger (Fee: T2 OR T3 item), Gain 1 free Reroll that doesn't expire until used.

Name: Take 2 Candy Bowl
Description:
Pass Trigger, can take as many Treats as want, after taking 2 Treats, each subsequent Treat has 1D2 of Forcefully Gaining a "Trick" Curse instead and ending this interaction.
NOTE: "Treats" cannot be used for the 1D2 during this interaction.

Name: Blacksmith
Description:
Pass Trigger, you can Exchange 3 Items of the same Tier for 1 or 3 choices of a higher Tiered item.
NOTE: Does apply to T0 items.

Name: Temple Pedestal
Description:
Pass Trigger, Replace 1 item in your inventory with the Golden Idol and Roll 1D4:
1-3 = Choose to either Lose 11 Gold, Discard 1 chosen item (including the Golden Idol), or Gain a "Wound" Curse.
4 = Nothing happens.

Name: Golden Punching Bag
Description:
This Building has 20 hp, and you must Move into it 20 times total towards to break it, blocks Line of Sight.
Whenever a Player makes it lose hp, Gain 1 Gold equal for each hp destroyed.
The HP of this Building is kept, but is Destroyed at the Start of the User's Next Turn.

Name: Transmutation Circle
Description:
Pass Trigger, you can Exchange as many items as you want for Mana at a rate of 3 * Cost.
NOTE: Cannot Exchange Curses.

Name: Humble Propane Tank
Description:
If this Building is Destroyed, Explode in a 5x5 AoE.
All Players inside choose to either Lose 10 Gold or Discard 1 chosen item.
All Buildings in a 3x3 AoE are Destroyed.

Name: Enchantment Table
Description:
Pass Trigger, Choose an Item and Enchant it by adding one of these Item Modifiers:
----- Knockback II -----
Adjacent, Line of Sight, and Projectile Ranged items now make the Target Move 2 Spaces in the chosen direction.
NOTE: This enchantment applies first over the item's effect.
NOTE: Using a Line of Sight item as a 7x7 or 9x9 Range using Radio Antenna (and similar) does NOT apply this effect.
NOTE: Grenade Knockback only works if placed directly on top of them.
----- Sharpness V -----
Adjacent, Line of Sight, and Projectile Ranged items now make the Target Lose 10 Gold and Forcefully Gain a "Wound" Curse.
----- Protection IV -----
While held, this will negate the next ENTIRE Effect applied to you containing these afflictions: Steal, Lose, Lingering Move Point, Forcefully Gain, Gain "Curse".
NOTE: This will negate all Hazards triggered at the Start of your Turn.
----- Thorns II -----
While held, the next effect directly targeting you from another Player's item will Steal 8 Gold from them.
NOTE: The effect targeting you is NOT negated and still applies.
NOTE: Only applies to directly targeted, so Grenades and placed Hazards do not count.

Name: Pirate Armory
Description:
Pass Trigger, roll 1D4 to Gain one of the following:
1 = Blunderbuss
2 = Cutlass
3 = Handcannon
4 = 18 Gold

Name: Ground-to-Air Flak Gun Mark II
Description:
While you are on this Space, you can choose as many items in your Inventory for the Target to Gain.
The Target Loses Gold equal to the item's Cost+Tier.
NOTE: If an item with "Melancholic Recollection" is regained, it cannot be retransferred this Turn.

Name: Gas Mortar
Description:
Pass Trigger, Create the "Gas Clouds" Environment in a 3x3 on any Space.
———— Gas Cloud effect ————
Waiting: Lose 6 Gold, doesn't apply to other Players before the User in the turn order.
Overtime: At the Start of every Round, all Players inside Lose 8 Gold and Gain -3 Lingering Move Points.

Name: Inventor's Lab
Description: Pass Trigger, Choose 1 of 3 Passives to Gain for free.

Name: Gold Tile
Description: Start Turn, Gain 8 Gold.

Name: Charging Station
Description: Start Turn, Restore your Mana back to full.

Name: Barbeque
Description:
Pass Trigger, can add the "Grilled" Item Modifier to any item in your inventory, which grants the item 1 additional usage.
NOTE: Cannot be used on an already Grilled item.

Name: Non-Euclidean Doorframe
Description: Leaving the Row this Building is on by Moving through the Board normally instead teleports you back to the start of the same Row.

Name: Bank Vault
Description:
Start Turn (Fee 5 Gold), you can add or take any amount of Gold into the Vault.
Every Round, add compound interest of 0.1 percent at a minimum of 1 Gold.
NOTE: All Gold in the Bank Vault is SHARED.

Name: Shrine of Stonks
Description:
Start Turn (Fee: 1 T3 item), all Gold and Temporary Gold gained this Turn is doubled.
NOTE: Steal is not doubled.
NOTE: Bank Vault does not count.

Name: Bubble Elevator
Description:
Pass Trigger, Move Points go vertically upwards instead until the End of your Turn.
Only applies to the next 3 Move Points this Turn.

Name: Ender Chest
Description:
Pass Trigger: Store and withdraw an infinite number of items here.
Each Player has their own Ender Chest inventory.
NOTE: The Ender Chest inventory persists even after this Building is Destroyed.

Name: Shrine of Change
Description: Start Turn (Fee: 1 Artifact), gain a Random Artifact of equal level.

Name: Treasure Hoard
Description: Pass Trigger, choose 1 of 2 random Tier 3 items to Forcefully Gain.

Name: Cleansing Bath
Description: Pass Trigger (1 Curse), Gain a "Natural Bog Water" item.

Name: Deployable Spatial Overlapper
Description:
Overwrite the Row this Building is on with the Spatial Hallway, does not actually count as the Spatial Hallway dimension.
If multiple of this Building are placed, the Spatial Hallway copies over all changes.
When this Building is destroyed, restore the original Row.
NOTE: Placing things on the Deployable Spatial Anchor copies to the Spatial Hallway and all other duplicates of the Deployable Spatial Anchor.

Name: Shopping Basket
Description:
During your Turn, you can hold onto items that exceeds your inventory.
At the End of your Turn, either pay 1 Gold for each overflowed item or Discard any item to be under the overflow limit.
NOTE: Items from Forcefully Gain and Curses are still held in the inventory.

Name: Enlightened Anvil
Description:
Start Turn (Fee 1 T3 Item), convert a Passive item into an Artifact or store it outside of the inventory permanently.
NOTE: Some Passives can still Destroy themselves.

Name: Town Square
Description: Start Turn, Trigger all (Pass Trigger) Buildings Adjacent to this.

Name: Sand and Land Burger
Description: Your Artifact Ability can be used up to 3 times for free.

Name: Skipping Rope
Description:
This Turn, you now move 1 additional Space forwards whenever you Move along the board normally.
NOTE: Counts as Passing the Space but cannot use Pass Trigger Buildings as it requires you to be on the same Space.

Name: LEGACY 5G Brain Broadcaster (Active Piece)
Description:
Roll your Move Dice and Move the Target forward or backwards based on that.
You can also use any Mobility, Reverse or Mobility items which ONLY apply to the User to move the Target.
Refill +6
NOTE: Move Dice has 1 free Reroll like normal.

Name: Custom Shipment Order
Description:
Place an order for any item while at a Shop for 2 times the price, cannot buy Artifacts or Tier 0.
Gain this item at the next Shop you Pass.
NOTE: Chosen item can be bought with Temporary Gold.

Name: Wishing Well
Description:
Start Turn (Fee: 1 Artifact), Gain Any 5 items
Note: Cannot obtain these items:
Any type of Artifacts
Items that are directly sold for Gold

Name: Portal Gun
Description:
Choose 2 Spaces to replace with a Portal.
Whenever the Portal is first Passed, the Player is automatically teleported to the other Portal.
Portals last until the Start of the User's Next Turn.

Name: Shrimp Fried Rice
Description:
Choose any number and replace Any Dice Roll with it.
NOTE: Only goes up to your Dice maximum (D6 = 1-6).

Name: LEGACY Santa's Goodie Bag
Description: Forcefully Give any Player 10 Gold or a "Rock".

Name: LEGACY Barbed Wire
Description:
Gain -0.5 Lingering Move Points and Lose 3 Gold based on the number of your Move Dice.
NOTE: Rate is -0.5 L-Point (rounded down) and +3 Gold per 1 Move Point.

Name: LEGACY Escape Rope
Description: Escape all Hazard and Building effects when used.

Name: Frozen Yogurt
Description: Choose a Player, Gain 1 Constant for 3 turns.

Name: Black Hole
Description: If you End your Turn Adjacent to this, get pulled to this Space

Name: Deflated Raspberry
Description: Choose a number between 1-5, gain that Constant and Lose 4 times the Gold.

Name: Boxing Day
Description:
Places your entire inventory in a Box in any Space at the End of their Turn.
A Box is a Building which is accessed through Pass Trigger.

Name: Sporknife
Description: Whenever the User uses a Food item, Gain 5 Artifact Refill.

Name: Stewing Pot
Description:
Pass Trigger, The User can combine the effects of up to 5 Food Items into a "Suspicious Stew" Item containing every effect.
NOTE: Cannot combine Suspicious Stew, Grilled items or Sauced items.

Name: BBQ Sauce
Description:
Item Modifier, the item this is combined with can be used 1 additional time.
This Item can only be used when combined with another item, which can be done at any time.
NOTE: Only 1 Item Modifier per item maximum.

Name: Weird Key
Description:
When opening a Chest, choose to replace its loot with equally weighted T0 items.
NOTE: Does not include Artifacts.

Name: LEGACY Trading Post
Description:
Players on the same Row as send and accept Trades from others.
Trades are basically to send and receive Gold, items or Artifacts.

Name: Rusty Key
Description: When opening a Chest, choose a version number, the Chest loot will only contain items from that version.

Name: LEGACY Scroll of Teleportation
Description: Teleport to a Space in a 3x3 around the User

Name: LEGACY Jewel
Description:
Lvl 1 Moving 6 spaces in 1 turn gives you 3 gold once per turn.
Lvl 2 Rolling the highest dice face gives you that much gold.

Name: LEGACY Sacrificial Effigy
Description: Converts all Move Points into Gold, do not Move.

Name: LEGACY Life Link Plugin
Description: Choose 2 Targets, all Hazard/Building effects gained are shared with the Target until your Turn.

Name: LEGACY Nuke
Description:
7x7 explosion, each layer has its own Lose amount, explodes on User's Turn.
Distance 1 (on the nuke) = 40 Gold
Distance 2 = 30 Gold
Distance 3 = 20 Gold
Distance 4 = 10 Gold

Name: LEGACY Voodoo Doll
Description: Target copies all of your DIRECTIONAL movements during this Turn.

Name: Tea
Description:
Roll your Dice and save the number.
This number can be substituted with Any Dice number one time, lasts until the End of your Turn.

Name: Can of Beans
Description: Gain 3 Constant and create a Gas Cloud on all Spaces Adjacent and on the User.

Name: Water
Description: Gain 1 Reroll, Gain 5 Mana and Discard 1 Curse.

Name: Steak
Description: Move 8 Spaces and Gain 1 Constant.
Blurb: By the time you've smelled it, you have already Eradicated it.

Name: Sardines
Description:
Go backwards 4 Spaces and create 4 Gas Clouds on each Space (starting from the Space you used the item).
———— Gas Cloud effect ————
Waiting: Lose 6 Gold, doesn't apply to other Players before the User in the turn order.
Overtime: At the Start of every Round, all Players inside Lose 8 Gold and Gain -3 Lingering Move Points.

Name: Vegetables
Description:
Gain 2 Constant.
If Grilled, change this effect to Gain 1-2 chosen Constant.

Name: Gift
Description:
Pass Trigger, Gain 1 Random Item from the Chest loot table.
NOTE: Does NOT count towards Pass Trigger maximum.

Name: Caltrops
Description:
Gain -2 Lingering Move Points.
If you now have -5 or more Lingering Move Points, Gain a "Wound" Curse.

Name: Brimming Glass of Spiders
Description:
Gain 8 Constant and Create Spider Webs around the User in a 5x5 area.
The User is immune to Spider Webs next turn.

Name: Pearl
Description: Can be sold at a Shop for 25 Gold.

Name: Clementine Slice
Description: Gain 1 Constant on use.

Name: Rock Candy
Description:
Must be broken by Moving towards it 8 times, blocks Line of Sight.
The Player who breaks it Gains a Sugar Shard.
NOTE: If a Player is somehow on the same Space as the Rock, destroy it and add all of its remaining hp to the Player as Lingering Move Points.

Name: Sugar Shard
Description: Choose a number between 1-6 and Gain that many Constants and Gold.

Name: Exploding Fruitcake
Description:
Throw an Exploding Fruitcake which explodes in a 3x3 at the Start of the User's Next Turn.
All Players in a 3x3 AoE get Stunned, Lose 24 Gold, and Forcefully Gain 2 items from "The Diner" based on their Dice for free.

Name: Potion of Healing
Description: Gain 10 Constant and Discard all Curses from the Player, where each Curse Discarded reduces the Constant gained by 2.

Name: Portable Blender
Description:
The User can combine the effects of up to 3 Food Items into a "Suspicious Stew" Item containing every effect.
NOTE: Cannot combine Suspicious Stew, Grilled items or Sauced items.

Name: Everything Bagel
Description: Gain 20 Constant.

Name: Suspicious Stew
Description: This item contains the following effects below:

Name: Super Sweet Slice
Description:
On use, Gain 15 Mana.
Afterwards, for 3 Turns (including this turn), gain Advantage and a "2 Constant".

Name: Super Duper Super Suit
Description:
Creating using 4 pieces with at least 2 Active pieces.
Uses all the abilities below: (Refill 10 + X)
Actives:
Passives:

Name: Gachapon
Description: Gain a Random T2 item.

Name: Treat
Description: Player Gains 1 free "Reroll" OR "1 Constant" on use (chosen by the User).

Name: LEGACY Prison Cube
Description: Lock the next item usage in a 3x3 area (except for mop) in a Space, lasts until the Start of the User's Next Turn.

Name: Mystery Toy
Description: Gain a Random T1 item.

Name: Lost Treasure
Description: Gain a Random T3 item.

Name: LEGACY Border Control
Description: Lose 10 gold when Passing this tile.

Name: Fossil
Description:
Sell at a Shop for 8 + 1D10 Gold.
NOTE: Caps at 50 total Gold.

Name: 1 in a Bottle
Description: Move 1 Spaces forwards.

Name: 2 in a Bottle
Description: Move 2 Spaces forwards.

Name: 3 in a Bottle
Description: Move 3 Spaces forwards.

Name: 4 in a Bottle
Description: Move 4 Spaces forwards.

Name: 5 in a Bottle
Description: Move 5 Spaces forwards.

Name: 6 in a Bottle
Description: Move 6 Spaces forwards.

Name: X Dice Face
Description: This item is applied to one of your Dice Faces to replace its result with X when Rolled.

Name: Yard Sale Permit
Description:
While held, you can choose any item in your inventory to be available for Players to buy at the Shop during their Turn for any price you set.
When a Player chooses to buy the item, another Player can choose to counter offer, in which case the User can choose which offer.
NOTE: Anything can be offered for the item, such as Gold or items.

Name: LEGACY Backpack
Description:
The Backpack's Attune is used as if you had the item in your inventory and used it directly from there.
Lvl 1: Attune Any TWO T1 usable items. (Refill 50)
Lvl 2: You now have infinite inventory spaces, gain -1 Move Points per overflow item.
Lvl 3: Attune Any. (Refill 25)
NOTE: The user can still move a minimum of 1 Space per turn from the Move Dice.
Blurb: Sometimes if you put an item in here, it'll get duplicated and you can use it again and again.

Name: LEGACY Tiny Town
Description:
Tiny Town's Attune is used as if you had the item in your inventory and you used your Lvl 1 or Lvl 3 ability with it.
Lvl 1: Use 1 Building in your inventory. (Refill 75)
Lvl 2: Attune any Building.
Lvl 3: Ability is now use up to 4 Buildings in your inventory.
NOTE: Using/Attuning to a Rock or anything similar allows you to place it.
NOTE: Cannot use or Attune to any Gold themed Buildings.
Blurb: To be a governor of a town within your own pockets — a Tiny Town.

Name: LEGACY Corrupted Data
Description:
While held, at the End of the User's Turn, roll 1D4:
1 = Replace 1 Chosen item with "Corrupted Data" other than with this item.
NOTE: Can only be applied one time, even if multiple copies of this are held.

Name: Potion of Shrouding Fog
Description:
Create Shrouding Fog in a 5x5 area which lasts until the Start of your Next Turn.
All item Range cannot extend into the 5x5 area, and all items cannot be used within the Fog.

Name: LEGACY Credit Card
Description:
Lvl 1: Can gain Temporary Gold for a debt which can be paid for at any time. After at least 1 Round has passed, increase interest by 1.05 per Round.
Lvl 2: All Shop items have a 10% cashback.
Lvl 3: Buying items gives you reward points based on paid price, T1=5 points and increases by 5 per tier.
NOTE: Reaching the end applies all debt to user. (in negative gold)
NOTE: Debt can only be paid with Gold.

Name: LEGACY Skull of Gold
Description: Gain 50 Temporary Gold, lose 1 Gold at the Start of every Turn until you reach 0 Gold.

Name: Knockback II
Description:
Item Modifier, Adjacent, Line of Sight, and Projectile Ranged items now make the Target move 2 Spaces in the chosen direction.
NOTE: This enchantment applies first over the item's effect.
NOTE: Using a Line of Sight item as a 7x7 or 9x9 Range using Radio Antenna (and similar) does NOT apply this effect.
NOTE: Grenade Knockback only works if placed directly on top of them.

Name: Sharpness V
Description: Item Modifier, Adjacent, Line of Sight, and Projectile Ranged items now make the Target Lose 10 Gold and Forcefully Gain a "Wound" Curse.

Name: Protection IV
Description:
Item Modifier, While held, this will negate the next ENTIRE Effect applied to you containing these afflictions: Steal, Lose, Lingering Move Point, Forcefully Gain, Gain "Curse".
NOTE: This will negate all Hazards triggered at the Start of your Turn.

Name: Thorns II
Description:
Item Modifier, While held, the next effect directly targeting you from another Player's item will Steal 8 Gold from them.
NOTE: The effect targeting you is NOT negated and still applies.
NOTE: Only applies to directly targeted, so Grenades and placed Hazards do not count.

Name: AI Generated Coupon
Description:
Roll your Dice to gain a discount equal to 5 times the Dice Result for the next item you purchase this Turn.
NOTE: Overwrites the Shop Discount.

Name: On-Site Facility Card
Description:
Attune a Building that has a Fee, this Building can also be used at any Shop once per turn.
NOTE: Pass Trigger maximum does NOT apply.
